main event: An unidentified flying object, described as a bright, pale-yellow balllike object, was observed moving slowly at high altitude from west to east in San Antonio, Texas.
interesting points: The object was about 40 feet in diameter and moved silently without any trail or maneuvers., The sighting occurred under clear, windy weather conditions., The object disappeared to the east after a brief observation., Mr. [REDACTED], while sitting on his front porch, was one of the witnesses., There were similar sightings reported related to the Satellite Echo passing over San Antonio around the same time.
witness description: Mr. [REDACTED] observed the object while sitting on his front porch.
